• 2D multiplayer mining game with real-time synchronization using MQTT
  • Features procedurally generated maps with various ores and building mechanics
  • Includes shop system, upgrades, and inventory management
  • Supports both desktop and mobile controls with responsive design
  • Implements cloud save system and local IndexedDB storage

Mega Miner Online is a collaborative mining game where players dig for resources, build structures, and upgrade their equipment. The game features real-time multiplayer functionality through MQTT, procedural world generation, and a comprehensive shop system. Players can transfer fuel, use explosives, and discover teleporters for fast travel, all while managing their inventory and competing on leaderboards.
